title: Signed T206 Doyle Portrait - SGC AU
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: Signed T206 Doyle Portrait - SGC AU
posts.post_content:
Up for a sale is a newly discovered signed T206 Larry Doyle portrait, which was just encapsulated by SGC .  You can see recent public sales of signed Doyle T206 cards:

[url]https://www.robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2014/spring/459/1909-1911-t206-autographed-larry-doyle-portrait/[/url]

[url]https://memorylaneinc.com/site/bids/bidplace?itemid=42231[/url]

[url]https://huntauctions.com/phone/imageviewer.cfm?auction_num=152&lot_num=48[/url]

Moved to eBay - thanks for looking!!
